ComicInfo.Title: Behind the Locked Door!; Dance, You Fool; There Grows a Rose; The Thing in the Water
ComicInfo.Summary:
Behind the Locked Door!: A man thinks himself a failure until he walks along a strange corridor in an abandoned house which shows him the positive consequences of his charitable acts.
Dance, You Fool: An unsuccessful dancer overhears the old man in the room next to him saying that his old pair of dancing shoes can make anyone a great dancer. He steals the shoes from the old man, but finds that he can never stop dancing.
There Grows a Rose: A florist grows kleptomaniac flowers.
The Thing in the Water: A fish enthusiast encounters a menacing "water monster" from Atlantis when he brings home a new breed of guppies.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Powell,Don Heck,Gene Colan,Ed Winiarski,Bob Powell,Don Heck,Gene Colan,Ed Winiarski
